Scope: Extrafi LYF and Extrafi XLend on OP Mainnet and Base

(1) USDC and WETH lending pools on Extrafi LYF: 10/1/2025 - 1/30/2026
(2) USDC, ETH, and cbBTC pools on Extrafi XLend: 10/1/2025 - 1/30/2026

We will be co-incentivizing the Base pools with CAKE tokens
Currently, we are emitting 8800 CAKE per day to our Base pools, and we can commit to providing 5000 CAKE per day within this grant period
Assuming the grant will be distributed over 90 days, assuming CAKE = $2.5, we will provide $1.125M in co-incentives, which is a 250% co-incentive ratio vs our requested 600k OP grant ($450k)

From the comments: In addition, we will provide $24,000 in USDC as co-incentives on Base to be distributed alongside the grant incentives. These co-incentives represent approximately 33% of the OP distributed to our users on Base. We believe this is a fair compromise that gives us the best chance of reaching our milestones and demonstrating the full impact the incentives can have. Updated: I have also updated the grant to match the request of 200k OP + $24000 USDC and the milestones to based on these changes.
